body:
I am trying to add a package for the [IceT](http://icet.sandia.gov/) compositing library but found that `spack create` seems not to understand
 - direct `git://` links in the member `url` (to check for tags)
 - links to `gitlab` releases, such as https://gitlab.kitware.com/icet/icet/tags with download links such as https://gitlab.kitware.com/icet/icet/repository/archive.tar.gz?ref=IceT-2.1.1

Should we can add the handling of those cases, too? :)

(for my specific problem: I will just add the releases I want manually.)
title: spack create: gitlab releases
